messages.subject: Shyrleys bitchin'
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/4/03 5:26:07 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/4/03 5:26:07 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Avila Beach (one of the best kids
beaches ever), >>

Oooh, ooooh, ooh. I STILL have dreams about moving to Avila beach.
We positively love that area of Cali and had wanted to move to San Luis
Obispo. We decided it was WAY too expensive and moved to FL instead.
Sometimes I wish we'd at least tried Cali first.
We looked at a house up on the hill in Avila beach that I've never forgotten.
It was white and oldish style with a porch that wrapped all around. (a mere
$300,000 ten years ago). I decided I wanted to stay a homeowner and we
couldn't have been if we'd moved there.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett

messages.subject: Shyrleys bitchin'

In a message dated 2/4/03 3:33:03 PM Central Standard Time,

<< When my kids have grown more, I'm planning to cycle across America so I'll
be collecting addresses for that.... >>

Keep me in mind too Shyrley! The gulf is a fabulous biking area, what with
all those beautiful beaches and all.
Who knows, maybe I'll be able to join ya for a stretch.

Ren
